User Interface

We provide some examples of MLPro [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro.git]’s SciUI funcionalities implementation, which is available on our GitHub file.

  • File 01: (SciUI) - Reuse of interactive 2D,3D input space [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro/blob/main/examples/sciui/Howto%2001%20(SciUI)%20-%20Reuse%20of%20interactive%202D%2C3D%20input%20space.py]

Moreover, you can find the UML diagram of MLPro’s UI funcionalities here [https://github.com/fhswf/MLPro/tree/main/doc/sciui].
